objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Advanced 77-Point AF System
• Full HD 1080p Video Recording
• Built-in Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• High-performance 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II APS-C sensor
• Advanced autofocus system with 77 AF points
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability
• Built-in Wi-Fi for instant photo sharing and remote control
• High-resolution electronic viewfinder (2.36M dots)
• Tiltable 3-inch LCD screen for creative angles
• Film simulation modes for unique photo effects
• Compatible with Fujifilm X-mount lenses
• Durable metal body construction
• Multiple manual control dials for precise settings
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel
• Fast continuous shooting up to 8 fps
• Advanced scene recognition and auto mode

banner_details:
This banner features a modern, tech-centric layout for a camera advertisement. The backdrop is a deep navy grid pattern overlaid with multishade blue and subtle diagonal golden strokes in the top right, giving it a dynamic, futuristic feel. The product image, a mirrorless camera, dominates the right side, cropped for focus and impact. Bold white text elements such as **heading**, **subheading**, and **price** stand out clearly against the dark background. The **tagline**, **discount_label**, and **cta** use a contrasting yellow and gold to draw attention. Supporting details and promotional copy like **description** and **promotional_text** are aligned to the left, ensuring an easy reading flow.

**Color Palette**:  
- Deep Navy Blue: #0D1D3A  
- Slate Blue: #1A2845  
- Dark Indigo: #0A1730  
- Golden Yellow: #F8C053  
- Classic White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a Fujifilm X-T10 camera, with a modern and sleek design characterized by a predominantly matte black body (#1E1E1E) and metallic accents. The lens rings feature glossy deep black (#000000) tones, contrasting effectively with the semi-gloss finish of the camera body. White text and markings (#FFFFFF) add sharp clarity and branding appeal, while subtle metallic grays (#4F4F4F) and dark silvers (#737373) on dials and borders enhance the premium feel. A splash of orange (#F28C28) on the lens adds visual interest. For an advertisement banner, blending these neutrals with bold contrasts ensures elegance while highlighting the product’s precision and craftsmanship.
